Text.Page:
While battling the Archdevan Imperial Army, noticed that they were protecting mysterious ore carts.
Guessing they might contain something of importance, grabbed samples of the "devastones" inside.
(The Parthian elites seem to be particularly protective of these ore carts. What's in them that's so valuable?)

Damn, but you're a clever one, !

Anyone else would've just run for it, then come back later!

I'll show these stones to Hagand. Maybe he can figure out what they're for."My pleasure."
